description: The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, today chaired his seventeenth interaction through PRAGATI - the ICT-based, multi-modal platform for Pro-Active Governance and Timely Implementation.  The
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Many areas of policy including telecom, housing & infrastructure were discussed during the PRAGATI session. 

We discussed in detail the grievances relating to telecom sector & ensuring quick & effective solutions for the benefit of citizens. We deliberated on ways to integrate latest technology to improve the pace & quality of work in the housing sector. 

Asked Secretaries & state Chief Secretaries to review the situation regarding ‘Ease of Doing Business.’ This is vital for India’s growth. 
http://nm-4.com/8gh0
